page.title: 08EDUCATIONAL PROVISION(Cont.)
page.content: The curriculum of the school is wide-ranging and fifth-year pupils sit G.C.E.'O'level,C.S.E.,City & Guilds (G.P.V.E.) and Pitman's examinations before moving on to Sixth-Form College,College of Further & Higher Education or into various forms of Youth Training Schemes or full-time employment. The school has a very active P.T.A.and it's pupils are involved in a number of extra-curricula activities inluding the normal team games and individual sports, the Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme,Youth Club and Outdoor Pursuit activities. Computer Studies has been a curriculumn subject for over three years with pupils from all years being introduced to computers and being able to take "O"Level and C.S.E.courses.
